name: PenguinEatFish
description:
Controls: Use the accelerometer on your smart-phone by tilting it to control the penguin. Sadly there is no restart button so you'll likely have to refresh your browser each time you lose (when the alert message-box pops up). 

Eat fish to score points, avoid treacherous creatures like squids, eels and a giant shark or whale.

Mobile only - recommended that you play using Google Chrome  Mobile browser. 

Music made by me using ToneJS - https://tonejs.github.io  

Made for the GameDevLeague game jam themed "fishy".
